text: Uh oh! Prince Harry is getting a lot of pressure from the royal fam to make his alleged fiancee Meghan Markle quit acting once they get married. But will that fly with the ‘ Skins ’ star? Fans of the royals are still freaking out after news broke that Prince Harry, 32, may have popped the question to girlfriend Meghan Markle, 36. Unfortunately, there has been no official announcement, so there ’ s still no way of knowing for sure. If they are truly engaged, why would they keep the happy news a secret?
